textTemplates.text:
Account and Addresses on {!Getquoterecordid.Name} that require Governance :


  • Sold To Account ({!Getquoterecordid.SBQQ__Account__r.Name}) : {!quoteaccountsimple2}


  • Bill To Account ({!Getquoterecordid.Bill_To_Account__r.Name}) : {!Billtoaccountsimple1}


  • Ship To Account ({!Getquoterecordid.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}) : {!Shiptoaccountsimple3}


  • Bill To Address ({!Getquoterecordid.Bill_To_Address__r.Name}) : {!billtoaddresssimple5}


  • Ship To Address ({!Getquoterecordid.Ship_To_Address__r.Name}) : {!shiptoaddresssimple4}
